REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0528 reute b f BC-BANK-OF-ENGLAND-DOES 03-25 0056

TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF ENGLAND DOES NOT OPERATE IN MONEY MARKET
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it had not operated in the money market during the morning session. Earlier, the Bank revised its forecast of the liquidity position in the system today to a surplus of 150 mln stg from its original estimate of a flat position. REUTER
